channel.title: Caving on Terminal
channel.description: Recent content in Caving on Terminal

item.title: Corra-Lynn
item.description: When I tell people I’ve just met that I’m a cave diver with claustrophobia, I always get a few confused looks followed by an inevitable round of questions along the lines of “Oh, so how do you stop the panic then?”. But when I mention my claustrophobia to people who know me and the kind of cave diving I do, the reaction is generally more like “You are very clearly broken, Josh - what is wrong with your brain?”.
